channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meet the Montana GOP lawmakers who were kicked out of their party for voting with Democrats
item.description: In April, nine GOP state senators from Montana were censured for voting with Democrats. Jo Ling Kent speaks with some of them about why they voted aga...

item.title: WATCH: How people are saying 'good riddance' to 2025
item.description: Days before New Year's Eve, crows gathered in Times Square to write down their bad memories and make room for better luck in 2026.

item.title: D.C. pipe bomb suspect told authorities "something just snapped," DOJ says

item.title: New winter storm brings dangerous wind, snow and ice
item.description: A new winter storm is moving east on Monday, bringing dangerous wind, snow and ice to millions.

item.title: Dangerous weather wrecks homes and causes major travel disruptions

item.title: WATCH: Scary truck-SUV collision caught on camera
item.description: Dashcam footage shows the moment an SUV crashed into the back end of an oncoming 18-wheeler. Fortunately, no serious injuries were reported.

item.title: Exclusive discounts from CBS Mornings Deals

item.title: Fed rate cuts and mortgage interest rates: What buyers can expect in 2026, according to experts
item.description: The Fed's cautious 2026 outlook has homebuyers wondering if there's still potential for lower mortgage rates.

Midair helicopter crash in New Jersey leaves 1 dead and another critically injured
item.description: Officials say two helicopters have crashed midair in southern New Jersey on Sunday, killing one person and leaving another critically injured.
